channel.title: [Matrix] Some doubts
channel.description:
Hello mates, I know Matrix is a "NEW" source, and with that I mean that an small amount of people use this source, I hope some can help me with this Doubts and issues:
~How do I activate a Tree to make it cut-able / " " " " " mining rock to make it mine-able.
~How do I start slayer on the server, I used the Enchanted Gem, and it says that the slayer master can be found on Burthope, but all Burthope is messed up.
~How do I train Farming, I tried to used the Cathebry patches but when I quick them to rake them it appears "Nothing Interesting happens", or how do I active each Patch?
I hope anyone can help me with this issues, Thanks!!

item.title: [Matrix] Some doubts
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

-Take the red pill
-Become Neo
-Create peace between the humans and machines
-Profit

Read full topic

item.title: [Matrix] Some doubts
item.dc:creator: @Arkamys Arkamys
item.description:
@Arkamys wrote:

Alright, thanks both, but I can’t find a mithril,addy,runite ore working on the server, does anyone of you know the ID of the rock?

Read full topic

item.title: [Matrix] Some doubts
item.dc:creator: @Potzon Potzon
item.description:
@Potzon wrote:

[ul][li]All the trees and rocks should have been added.[/li]
[li]You have to code Slayer by yourself, add dialogues. [/li]
[li]Farming is not working on the Matrix source. You have to code that by yourself too.[/li][/ul]

Read full topic

item.title: [Matrix] Some doubts
item.dc:creator: @Mattiaspope Mattiaspope
item.description:
@Mattiaspope wrote:

  1. You need to code the actions yourself; It should already be done.

  2. Just add a slayer master somewhere else…

  3. Read #1 ^^^

Read full topic
